content: Grahame asked me to put together a set of expectations for IGs that want to publish "in conjunction with" the R4 release (so they can bathe in the associated publicity glow). My draft is here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Ballot_Prep#IGs_published_with_R4
No. but to make sure I understand the concept, are these guides that will be published at their own URLs, or at a sub path of the R4 specification?

Own URLs. Only relationship to R4 is that they happen to be IGs that have passed ballot and are ready to publish at the same time - and so enjoy a portion of the publicity glow that accompanies the main release.

Transparancy is either not working or not noticable on the other pages

? example?
Observation, Encounter - they look the same to me
Never mind. I guess I managed to click on the wrong tab when I continue browsing. Looks fine
